about_the_game:
THIS DLC WILL BE PERMANENTLY FREE TO PLAY ON JULY 1ST!



Mage class for Shades Of Rayna.

Mage is a class in the game and uses staff and spellbook and just like Ranger, has 10 active and 5 passive skills.

Actives:
Eruption - Create an explosion on mouse location
Black Smoke - Swing your staff and throw a black smoke that moves through enemies and deals damage
Tremor - Swing your staff and unearth pillars from the ground to mouse location
Thunderburst - Spawn 6 thunder bolts around the character
Inferno - Spawn a number of meteors around the mouse location
Corruption - Hit your staff to ground and release a poison blast
Crystallize - Throw a crystallized projectile that stops on hit and explodes and deals damage every half a second
Splash - Spawn 6 baloons around the character and detonate them when you hit your staff to the ground, making an explosion
Condemn - Create an aura around the character and deal damage everything that's inside the aura
Outburst - Leap into the air and throw 4 consecutive meteors on mouse location

Passives:
Boom It - Basic attack explodes on hit dealing area damage instead of a single target
Steal - Your basic attacks steal 3% of your max health amount of life to your health
Second Chance - When your health reach 0, you resurrect with %50 health (Triggers once in a map)
Extend - Your dodge takes you even further and you make an explosion at the end of the dodge
Reduce - Reduce the cooldown of all skills by 1/4
